description:
RMS (Root Mean Square) limiter for thermal and long-term power protection.

# Internal Type Used in preset processing layer only. Not available in user or array layers. Path: `/audio/output/speaker/1/preset/rms_limiter`

# Purpose Protects speakers from thermal damage by limiting average power over time. Slower attack than peak limiter - prevents voice coil overheating, not transients.

# Structure - `bypass`: Enable/disable limiter - `threshold`: Maximum RMS level (1.0-50.0 V RMS) - `attack`: Attack time in milliseconds (0.1-100.0 ms) - `release`: Release time in milliseconds (0.1-100.0 ms) - `hold`: Hold time in milliseconds (0.0-500.0 ms) - `knee`: Soft knee amount (0.0-12.0 dB)

# Factory Defaults - Threshold: 45.0 V RMS (high, minimal limiting) - Attack: 2.5 ms (slower than peak limiter) - Release: 5.0 ms - Hold: 0 ms - Knee: 0 dB (hard limiting)

threshold.description: Maximum RMS level in V RMS (range: 1.0-50.0)

title: RmsLimiter
